section.p: A deployment container is available which prepares configuration file templates where you can specify settings such as mail server, login information, etc.
Use -v to mount the /docker directory to /target in the container:
This command creates two configuration files in the /docker directory:

li.p: .env: Configuration for Docker: where are the images to be retrieved, where is the base data directory.

ol.li: var.env: Configuration for ESCM, such as mail server, database and other settings. Refer to the Operator's Guide for details on the configuration settings.

section.p: Edit both files and adjust the configuration settings to your environment.
